test_questions.question: What is the fundamental difference between digitization and digitalization in business context?

options.A: Digitization is about converting data, digitalization transforms entire business models
options.C: Digitization uses computers, digitalization uses smartphones
options.D: Digitization is free, digitalization requires investment

test_questions.question: What is the most accurate description of digital transformation?

options.A: Creating a company website with contact information
options.B: Fundamental restructuring of organizational processes using digital technologies
options.C: Purchasing the latest computers for all employees
options.D: Increasing social media presence for marketing purposes

test_questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a strategic benefit of digitalization?

options.A: Enhanced operational efficiency through automation

test_questions.question: How does the aggregator business model generate value?

options.A: By manufacturing products at lower costs
options.B: By consolidating fragmented service providers onto a single digital platform
options.C: By storing inventory for multiple retailers

test_questions.question: What are the primary revenue streams for food delivery platforms?

options.A: In-app advertising and promotional content
options.C: Monthly subscription fees from frequent users
options.D: All of the above generate significant revenue

test_questions.question: What distinguishes UberEats' operational model?

options.A: It operates exclusively in the banking sector
options.B: It leverages Uber's existing driver network for food delivery
options.D: It serves as a property rental marketplace

test_questions.question: Which food delivery platforms have significant market presence in Uzbekistan?

options.A: Yandex Eats (Yandex Go ecosystem, post-Express24 merger, ~87% market control)
options.B: Uzum Tezkor (national leader, recognized dominant in 2025, top Google Play ranking)
options.C: Express24 (grocery/medicine focus, now integrated with Yandex Eats)
options.D: All of the above maintain strong positions despite market consolidation

test_questions.question: What is the core definition of a fintech platform?

options.A: A digital food ordering and delivery service
options.B: Technology-driven innovation in financial services delivery
options.C: A transportation network for financial advisors
options.D: A platform for renting financial equipment

test_questions.question: What category best describes PayPal's primary function?

options.A: Grocery delivery facilitator
options.B: Digital payments and money transfer platform

test_questions.question: Which digital payment platforms dominate the Uzbek market?

options.A: Payme, the pioneering platform launched in 2011
options.B: Click, with over 15 million users as of 2023
options.D: All of these platforms have substantial market share

test_questions.question: What are the key technological pillars of modern fintech platforms?

options.A: Artificial Intelligence for personalized services
options.C: Big Data Analytics for risk assessment and insights
options.D: All of these technologies are integral to fintech innovation

test_questions.question: How would you define a digital business platform?

options.A: A simple informational website
options.B: An integrated digital ecosystem connecting multiple stakeholders
options.D: A mobile app without backend integration

test_questions.question: What is the primary value proposition of renting platforms?

options.A: Permanent sale of physical goods
options.B: Temporary access to assets or services without ownership

test_questions.question: Which trend is NOT associated with future digitalization?

options.A: Widespread adoption of AI and machine learning
options.B: Expansion of Internet of Things (IoT) networks
options.D: Implementation of blockchain for various applications

test_questions.question: What services does Glovo's multi-category platform offer?

options.A: Exclusively restaurant meal delivery
options.B: Food, supermarket items, pharmaceuticals, and retail products

test_questions.question: What are the major operational challenges for food delivery platforms?

options.A: High customer acquisition and retention costs
options.D: All of these pose significant challenges

test_questions.question: When did Payme, Uzbekistan's first major fintech platform, launch?

options.A: 2011, giving it first-mover advantage

test_questions.question: What is Click platform's approximate user base as of 2023?

options.A: Around 1 million active users

test_questions.question: What is the recommended first step in developing a digitalization strategy?

options.A: Immediate procurement of latest technological solutions
options.B: Comprehensive assessment of current processes and identification of digital opportunities
options.C: Reduction of workforce to fund technology investments
options.D: Physical office modernization to appear tech-savvy

test_questions.question: Which larger corporate ecosystem does Yandex Eats operate within?

options.A: Google's multinational technology ecosystem
options.C: Facebook's social media and advertising network
options.D: Amazon's e-commerce and cloud computing empire

test_questions.question: What type of financial institution is Revolut?

options.A: A digital-only neobank without physical branches

test_questions.question: Why is GPS tracking technology essential for food delivery platforms?

options.A: To monitor restaurant kitchen operations
options.B: For real-time tracking of delivery personnel and estimated arrival times
options.D: To count inventory in partner restaurants

test_questions.question: What is HUMO in the context of Uzbekistan's financial infrastructure?

options.A: A popular food delivery application
options.B: The national domestic payment card system

test_questions.question: What characterizes 'dark kitchens' or 'ghost kitchens'?

options.A: Restaurants that operate only during nighttime hours
options.B: Food production facilities designed exclusively for delivery orders
options.C: Secret restaurant locations unknown to the public

test_questions.question: What is the defining feature of Decentralized Finance (DeFi)?

options.A: Centralized control by traditional financial institutions
options.B: Financial services operating without central intermediaries using blockchain

test_questions.question: How does the Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) model function?

options.A: Immediate purchase with deferred payment in installments
options.B: Full payment required before product receipt

test_questions.question: What is the principle behind Open Banking?

options.A: Secure sharing of banking data with authorized third-party providers
options.D: Confidential banking with no data sharing

test_questions.question: What are the main monetization strategies for fintech platforms?

options.A: Transaction fees per payment processed
options.D: Combinations of these revenue streams are common

test_questions.question: What factors accelerated fintech adoption in Uzbekistan?

options.A: Rapid mobile phone and internet penetration

test_questions.question: How do food delivery platforms impact restaurant economics?

options.A: They expand geographic customer reach significantly
options.B: They increase sales volume but reduce profit margins through commissions
options.C: Both expanded reach and margin pressure occur simultaneously
options.D: They have negligible impact on restaurant operations

test_questions.question: Who is Stripe's primary target customer segment?

options.A: Only large multinational corporations
options.B: Developers and online businesses needing payment integration

test_questions.question: In which geographic region did M-Pesa achieve remarkable success?

options.A: African markets, particularly Kenya and Tanzania

test_questions.question: What differentiates OSON platform in Uzbekistan's fintech landscape?

options.A: Its specialization in B2B payment gateway services
options.B: Exclusive focus on food delivery operations

test_questions.question: What is the official mobile banking application of KapitalBank?

options.A: Kapitalbank.Online, the official app

test_questions.question: How is Artificial Intelligence applied in food delivery platforms?

options.A: Personalized restaurant recommendations based on user behavior
options.B: Predictive algorithms for accurate delivery time estimates
options.D: All these AI applications enhance platform performance

test_questions.question: In which country does DoorDash hold dominant market position?

options.A: United States, where it originated
options.D: China, the world's largest delivery market

test_questions.question: Which platform is authorized for cryptocurrency trading in Uzbekistan?

options.A: Uznex, the licensed digital asset exchange
options.C: Click, focused on QR code payments

test_questions.question: What is Embedded Finance?

options.A: Integration of financial services into non-financial platforms
options.C: A society functioning without any cash

test_questions.question: What constitutes the largest cost component for food delivery platforms?

options.A: Digital marketing and customer acquisition
options.B: Logistics, delivery personnel, and rider incentives

test_questions.question: What are regulatory sandboxes in fintech context?

options.A: Controlled environments for testing innovative financial services
options.B: Physical testing facilities for banking equipment

test_questions.question: What is LendingClub's primary business model?

options.A: Peer-to-peer lending connecting borrowers and investors

test_questions.question: What are significant challenges for fintech expansion in Uzbekistan?

options.A: Persistent cash usage in rural areas

test_questions.question: What do 'Subscription Plans' offer on food delivery platforms?

options.A: Monthly fees for unlimited or discounted delivery

test_questions.question: What are robo-advisors in financial services?

options.A: Algorithm-based automated investment advisory platforms

test_questions.question: What is 'Digital Uzbekistan 2030'?

options.A: National strategic program for comprehensive digital transformation

test_questions.question: Where is Foodora predominantly operational?

options.A: European markets across multiple countries

test_questions.question: What service does Wise (formerly TransferWise) specialize in?

options.A: International money transfers with transparent fees

test_questions.question: What does KYC represent in fintech compliance?

options.A: Know Your Customer identity verification procedures

test_questions.question: What are emerging trends in food delivery platform evolution?

options.A: Autonomous delivery vehicles including drones and robots
options.D: All these trends are shaping the industry's future

test_questions.question: How many mobile users existed in Uzbekistan as of 2023?

options.A: Approximately 10 million mobile subscribers

instructions: Each question has only one correct answer. Questions cover digitalization concepts, platform business models, and Uzbekistan's digital ecosystem.
